title: Remnant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Summon a black hole over your house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The black hole will attack your visitors, dealing Powerful attacks to all of them, and failing their visit.
- If you are transported, you will attack visitors to both you and the other player. Players killed by you have their will deleted and show up as “Erased” in the graveyard.
- Players who survive will know that you are the Remnant.
- You may summon a black hole three times. You cannot do so two nights in a row.

desc:
Post 518
*All that was will cease to be.*
